original_text: For whosoever eateth the fat of the beast, of which men offer an offering made by fire unto the Lord, even the soul that eateth it shall be cut off from his people.
korean_text: 사람이 여호와께 화제로 드리는 제물의 기름을 먹으면 그 먹는 자는 자기 백성 중에서 끊어지리라

sentences.original_text: For whosoever eateth the fat of the beast
of which men offer an offering made by fire unto the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 여호와께 불로 드리는 제물인 그것을

sentences.original_text: even the soul that eateth it
shall be cut off from his people
